Uses of Class
ml.alternet.parser.Grammar.Rule

  • Packages that use Grammar.Rule 
    Package Description
    ml.alternet.grammars  
    ml.alternet.parser
    Allow to design grammar, parse input and generate a custom data structure.
    ml.alternet.parser.ast
    Helper classes to build an abstract syntax tree thanks to token mappers and rule mappers.
    ml.alternet.parser.handlers
    Various handlers.
    ml.alternet.parser.util
    Data structures utils.
    ml.alternet.parser.visit
    Base algorithms for visiting rules.

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Grammar.AtLeast
      Make a rule repeatable.
      static class  Grammar.AtMost
      Make a rule repeatable.
      static class  Grammar.Bounds
      Make a rule repeatable in bounds.
      static class  Grammar.CharToken
      A character token, based on compositions of character ranges.
      static class  Grammar.CharToken.Composed
      A token made of a several char ranges.
      static class  Grammar.CharToken.Single
      A token made of a single char range.
      static class  Grammar.Choice
      A choice rule ; when parsing, the first rule that is fulfilled is selected.
      static class  Grammar.Combine
      A rule skeleton for combining rules.
      static class  Grammar.DropToken
      A token not transmitted to the event handler while parsing.
      static class  Grammar.EnumToken<T>
      A token made from an enum class or a list of string values ; the order of the enum values doesn’t matter ; the longest value if available will be read from the input.
      static class  Grammar.EnumValueToken
      An enum value token, just like a string, but with an enum value.
      static class  Grammar.GrammarToken
      A token based on a grammar.
      static class  Grammar.Number
      A number token.
      static class  Grammar.Optional
      Make a rule optional.
      static class  Grammar.Proxy
      Allow to separate a rule declaration and its assignment.
      static class  Grammar.Proxy.Deferred
      A proxy defined by an initializer.
      static class  Grammar.Proxy.Named
      A proxy defined by its name.
      static class  Grammar.Repeatable
      Base class for repeatable rules.
      static class  Grammar.Sequence
      A sequence rule.
      static class  Grammar.StringToken
      A string token.
      static class  Grammar.Token
      When parsing, a token yield a EventsHandler.TokenValue.
      static class  Grammar.TypedToken<T>
      A token based on rules.
      static class  Grammar.TypedToken.Mapper<T>
      A token that collect its subrules to a list of items that are mapped to a value.
      static class  Grammar.TypedToken.Number
      A token that collect its subrules to a number.
      static class  Grammar.TypedToken.String
      A token that collect its subrules to a single string.
      static class  Grammar.TypedToken.TypedNumber<T extends Number>
      A token that collect its subrules to a number of a given type.
      static class  Grammar.Wrapper
      A rule skeleton for composing rules.
      static class  Grammar.ZeroOrMore
      Make a rule optional repeatable.
